1.0.name: wordpress/yahoo-news-feed
1.0.description:
Yahoo News Feed allows the news from your site to appear automatically in Yahoo Search Results as news items.

From Yahoo: Display news information directly in Yahoo! Search. Add code to indicate to Yahoo! that a news story on your page, and when we next crawl your site, we'll take care of the rest. From your markup, well be able to extract structured data from your site and render it automatically in an enhanced result in search results. * Types of content permitted: news articles and opinion pieces with optional images. * How soon after I add my markup will I see my enhanced result appear? Assuming your markup is correct, your enhanced result will appear after Yahoo! recrawls your page; this can take between a few days and a few weeks depending on your site.

Generated news feed is in NewsML1.2 format, as specified on Yahoo! Search Monkey develop page

Plugin by Vladimir Prelovac. Looking for
